snippet.title: Aztech Forgotten Gods - Extended Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
When an unfamiliar enemy awakens to threaten Tenochtitlan, Achtli must master the hidden powers in Lightkeeper, a lost artifact from a time long forgotten.

Aztech Forgotten Gods will launch on Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and PC via Steam in Q1 2022. An all-new demo will be available soon!
